Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.slice

Class SimulationBoxViewSlicer

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.slice.SimulationBoxViewSlicer
public class SimulationBoxViewSlicer extends Object
Creates a number of image files for displaying different plains in a simulation box. The box is able to display a large number of molecular particles within the box. Therefore the architecture is partially optimised for speed.
Author:
Stefan Neumann, Achim Zielesny

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationBoxViewSlicer

      public SimulationBoxViewSlicer(SimulationBoxViewEnum aBoxView, String aDestinationDirectory, BoxSizeInfo aBoxSizeInfo, GraphicalParticlePositionArrayList aGraphicalParticlePositionArrayList, ImageFileType anImageFileType, int anMasterPanelWidthInPixel, int anMasterPanelHeightInPixel) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new instance. NOTE:
      Parameters:
      aBoxView - Box view
      aDestinationDirectory - The destination directory for the images
      aBoxSizeInfo - Box size info
      aGraphicalParticlePositionArrayList - Graphical particle position array list (may be null, then empty images are created). NOTE: Array sort order as well as its elements MAY BE CHANGED.
      anImageFileType - File type of the images to be created
      anMasterPanelWidthInPixel - The width in pixel of the master panel
      anMasterPanelHeightInPixel - The height in pixel of the master panel
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

  • Method Details

    • createSlices

      public boolean createSlices()
      Create slices
      Returns:
      True: Slice creation was successful, false: Otherwise (Slice creation failed)

    • getSliceImage

      public BufferedImage getSliceImage(int aSliceIndex) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns slice image
      Parameters:
      aSliceIndex - Index of slice (0 to Preferences.getInstance().getNumberOfSlicesPerView() - 1)
      Returns:
      Slice image or null if image is not available
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

    • getSliceStartValue

      public double getSliceStartValue(int aSliceIndex)
      The start value of the slice in the box
      Parameters:
      aSliceIndex - Index of slice (0 to Preferences.getInstance().getNumberOfSlicesPerView() - 1)
      Returns:
      Start value of the slice in the box or NaN if not available
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

    • getSliceEndValue

      public double getSliceEndValue(int aSliceIndex)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      End value of the slice in the box or NaN if not available
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

    • getNearestParticleIndex

      public int getNearestParticleIndex(int aStartSliceIndex, de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace aPointInSpace)
      Returns index of particle which is nearest to point beginning from start slice
      Parameters:
      aStartSliceIndex - Index of start slice (0 to Preferences.getInstance().getNumberOfSlicesPerView() - 1)
      aPointInSpace - Point in slice
      Returns:
      Index of particle which is nearest to point or -1 if no particle is near (i.e. aPointInSpace is outside particle radius of every particle)

    • getNearestGraphicalParticlePosition

      public GraphicalParticlePosition getNearestGraphicalParticlePosition(int aStartSliceIndex, de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace aPointInSpace)
      Returns graphical particle position which is nearest to point beginning from start slice
      Parameters:
      aStartSliceIndex - Index of start slice (0 to Preferences.getInstance().getNumberOfSlicesPerView() - 1)
      aPointInSpace - Point in slice
      Returns:
      Graphical particle position which is nearest to point or -1 if no particle is near (i.e. aPointInSpace is outside particle radius of every particle)

    • getParticleIndicesOfAllMolecules

      public LinkedList<Integer> getParticleIndicesOfAllMolecules(int aStartSliceIndex, de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace aPointInSpace)
      Returns linked list with one particle index of all molecules which is nearest to point beginning from start slice
      Parameters:
      aStartSliceIndex - Index of start slice (0 to Preferences.getInstance().getNumberOfSlicesPerView() - 1)
      aPointInSpace - Point in slice
      Returns:
      linked list with one particle index of all molecules nearest to point or null if no particle is near (i.e. aPointInSpace is outside particle radius of every particle)
